text: The other person in that thread spoke well and sounded upbeat. Was refreshing

elements.text: The other person in that thread spoke well and sounded upbeat. Was refreshing

text: that person showed zero interest in fixing their code, can't even acknowledge they use the wrong guard for Visual C++ and insist on saying there is no point in supporting MinGW

text: I have interacted with two of the other primary authors at different points and had a nice experience. I don't know what the delegation of work is between them all. I share your sentiment though fwiw
